title: California passed new congressional maps. The scramble for 2026 begins.
shortDescription: Republican Rep. Ken Calvert said he will run for a newly drawn Southern California district, setting up a possible clash with GOP Rep. Young Oak Kim.

title: What Democrats' election wins mean for the record-breaking shutdown
shortDescription: Democrats won big across the country on Tuesday night. What does that mean for the shutdown?

title: Democrats ride Trump-era economic anxiety to wave of election wins
shortDescription: Economic issues were a driving factor in the off-year elections, putting consumer costs under Trump's administration in the spotlight

title: Trump blames shutdown for election results
shortDescription: President Donald Trump suggested the shutdown was to blame for Republican election losses.

title: Trump-led partisan redistricting battle isn't over in Kansas
shortDescription: While Kansas Republicans failed to call a special session on redistricting, the GOP gerrymandering effort targeting Sharice Davids isn't over.

title: Democrats get mixed messages in 2025 election wins in NJ, VA, NYC
shortDescription: Zohran Mamdani's NYC win, coupled with moderates' victories in New Jersey and Virginia, ignite a Democratic debate over 2026 election strategy.

title: What was Trump's reaction to the election results? 'And so it begins!'
shortDescription: President Donald Trump told Republicans they “learned a lot” from Nov. 4, 2025, Election Day results where Democrats won, including Zohran Mamdani.

title: Supreme Court justices raise concerns about Trump tariffs: recap
shortDescription: The Supreme Court considering Trump's tariffs marks the first major test of his agressive assertion of presidential powers before the high court.

title: Jared Isaacman is once again Trump's frontrunner to head NASA
shortDescription: Jared Isaacman, a billionaire who has been to space on two privately-funded ventures, is once again President Trump's frontrunner to lead NASA.

title: Trump blames shutdown as Democrats score big wins: Live updates
shortDescription: Democrats say their Tuesday night wave of election victories is a referendum against President Trump.

title: Andrew Cuomo concedes NYC mayor election
shortDescription: Andrew Cuomo conceded the New York mayoral election to Zohran Mamdani as crowd booed.

title: Zohran Mamdani's election night party showcases a new coalition
shortDescription: A diverse but younger-skewing crowd filled the Paramount Theater in Brooklyn with enthusiasm, dancing to hip hop and celebrating the socialist's win.

title: Mamdani taunts Trump in election speech: 'Turn the volume up'
shortDescription: Zohran Mamdani dared President Trump to keep up his attacks in a combative election night speech after being elected the next New York City mayor.
